title: fix(ui-markdown): fallback to json view if markdown parsing is unsucessful

body: > [!IMPORTANT] > `MarkdownRenderer` in `MarkdownViewer.tsx` now falls back to a JSON view if markdown parsing fails, with new dependencies added to support this functionality. > > - **Behavior**: > - `MarkdownRenderer` in `MarkdownViewer.tsx` now falls back to JSON view if markdown parsing fails. > - Displays an info message when falling back to JSON view. > - **Dependencies**: > - Added `remark-parse`, `remark-rehype`, `remark-stringify`, and `unified` to `package.json` to support markdown parsing. > - **UI Components**: > - Added `Info` icon from `lucide-react` to indicate markdown parsing failure. > > This description was created by [](https://www.ellipsis.dev?ref=langfuse%2Flangfuse&utm_source=github&utm_medium=referral) for 3268a5c19f281b6e76702408a09f7cc83c5ab9b2. It will automatically update as commits are pushed.
